mapper.insert: insert into plan( NAME, SHOW_TYPE, OS_TYPE, POWER, START_TIME, END_TIME, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PLAN_ID ) values ( #{NAME}, #{SHOW_TYPE}, #{OS_TYPE}, #{POWER}, #{START_TIME}, #{END_TIME}, #{ADD_TIME}, #{UPDATE_TIME}, #{PLAN_ID} )
mapper.update: update plan set NAME = #{NAME}, SHOW_TYPE = #{SHOW_TYPE}, OS_TYPE = #{OS_TYPE}, POWER = #{POWER}, START_TIME = #{START_TIME}, END_TIME = #{END_TIME} where PLAN_ID = #{PLAN_ID}
mapper.select: select NAME, SHOW_TYPE, OS_TYPE, ADD_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, PLAN_ID, POWER, START_TIME, END_TIME from plan where PLAN_ID = #{PLAN_ID}
